name: Sonar Spaceship
description:
Introduction

Sonar Spaceship (working title) is a game about a spaceship collecting containers of unknown origin.

Description

As the captain of this spaceship you collect containers across sectors such as Novum Rimor, Anser, Venandi, Mors Lapides and Spatium Animalias. You have to avoid obstacles such as rocks and even mines. Who knows what awaits you at the end when you travel deeper into space?

Each sector contains 6 or 3 levels you can choose from your level selection screen.

Don't wait and collect all the floating containers of unknown origin for science, today!

Credits Eric Rudolf Daniels
